name: The North Face Eco Trail Down -7C Sleeping Bag - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Enjoy the lightweight comfort and compressibility of a down bag on spring to fall adventures. Recycled materials are easy on the environment. The high-loft down is channelled in horizontal baffles to surround you as you sleep. And the adjustable hood lets you seal warm when the temps are well below zero.Ripstop recycled polyester exterior and soft polyester taffeta lining.600 fill recycled down insulation is certified to the Global Recycling Standard which ensures accurate content claims and good working conditions while minimizing harmful environmental impact.1-hand adjustable hood helps seal out the cold.Wrap-around J-zip offers improved mobility and venting.Internal pocket for your phone and headlamp.Roomy vaulted footbox.Tie down loops secure your pad to your sleeping bag.

        Sustainability
